participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Ella enjoys solitary activities and values deep connections with her interests.
participant_1.background: I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts. My mother is dead. I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know. I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid. I have a house with a large yard for my paps to hunt mushrooms.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and creative, Liam finds joy in making others happy and loves learning new things.
participant_2.background: I love working with flowers and making people happy with them. I work in commercials. I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things. I like to cook with my mom and we try new recipes every week. I want to find a place to live that is perfect for my hobbies and interests.

content.text: Hey, I'm interested in books, do you like to read?
Yeah, I love to read! I'm a lifelong learner and I love to devour books and explore new things.
Nice, what kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm especially interested in history, travel, and self-help books.
I love reading history books! I find it so interesting to learn about the past and how it shaped the present.
Me too! I love learning about different cultures and how they've changed over time.
What's your favorite book that you've read recently?

That's a tough question! I have so many favorite books, but I think I'd have to say my favorite recent book was "The Great Influenza" by John M. Barry. It's a nonfiction book about the 1918 flu pandemic, and it's really eye-opening.
Oh, I've heard of that book! I've been meaning to read it. It sounds like it's really interesting.
It is! I highly recommend it.
I'll have to check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books.
